name: The Virtua Kolect
public_notice: Terra Virtua Kolect (TVK) has recently rebranded to The Virtua Kolect (TVK). Visit this post for more information.

description.en: Virtua is a gamified metaverse which provides immersive social, web3 gaming, digital collectible and interactive experiences.
